messages.title: Pendle Future
messages.content: Voters in Pendle will decide this election. Getting on with Pendle’s priorities.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: New Brexit deal agreed with EU. Protects jobs and trade, ends uncertainty for our economy, ready to go from day one of a new parliament.
Secured a new Enterprise Zone at Lomeshaye creating hundreds of new jobs.
Secured £30 million for the Colne to Skipton Railway.
Dedicated town centre police teams, knife prevention orders, strengthening the courts to keep criminals off our streets.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Last time, the Conservatives were just nine seats short of a majority.

issues.brexitEurope: New Brexit deal agreed with EU. Protects jobs and trade, ends uncertainty for our economy, ready to go from day one of a new parliament.
issues.lawCrime: Dedicated town centre police teams, knife prevention orders, strengthening the courts to keep criminals off our streets.
issues.transport: Secured £30 million for the Colne to Skipton Railway.

community.content: Secured a new Enterprise Zone at Lomeshaye creating hundreds of new jobs.

politicalExperience.achievements: Secured funding for local projects including transport and business zones.

images.caption: Brexit deal agreed and ready to go
